input_email_body:
Subject: System Error Notification

An unexpected system error has disrupted access to hospital application data My name is Fatima Al-Farsi.. This may be due to recent software updates causing network instability. Despite attempts to resolve the issue by restarting the system and re-establishing network connections, the problem persists. You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com.
